author: Wires English | ANI
title: PM Narendra Modi to bureaucrats: Work with trust and team spirit!
text:
PM Narendra Modi to bureaucrats: Work with trust and team spirit! By ANI on October 13, 2015 at 6:20 AM Comments 
New Delhi, Oct. 12: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday asked bureaucrats to work with mutual team spirit and trust besides encouraging them to go for innovation and make judicious use of technology. He interacted informally with about 100 senior IAS officers of Joint Secretary and Additional Secretary rank, participating in a mid-career training programme. 
During the interaction, the officers shared their experiences in areas such as development works; agriculture, irrigation and food-processing; inflation; public health; tribal and social welfare; female foeticide; and skill development. 
The Prime Minister appreciated the thoughts and suggestions expressed by the officers. He emphasized the importance of continuous innovation and enhancement of administrative capacities and processes. He spoke of the importance of judicious use of technology and infrastructure in administration, and also mentioned his interaction with various Ministries and State Governments through the PRAGATI platform. 
The Minister of State in the Prime Ministerâ€™s Office (PMO), Jitendra Singh, Cabinet Secretary P.K. Sinha, and Additional Principal Secretary in the PMO, P.K Mishra were present on the occasion.
